snippet: STANLEY--Ted. The Treatment Advocacy Center deeply mourns the passing of Ted Stanley, whose extraordinary generosity toward the fight against serious mental illness was unique in the world. Our deepest sympathies go to his son Jonathan, our co-founder and board member. Stephen Segal, Chairman, Board of Directors; John Snook, Executive Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: STANLEY--Ted. The Treatment Advocacy Center deeply mourns the passing of Ted Stanley, whose extraordinary generosity toward the fight against serious mental illness was unique in the world. Our deepest sympathies go to his son Jonathan, our co-founder and board member. Stephen Segal, Chairman, Board of Directors; John Snook, Executive Director 1/3
